feed.title: GitHub Shell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Shell in GitHub

entry.title: thegreatestgiant/novnc
entry.summary:
novnc

How To Get

  1. Login to your GitHub account.
  2. Click on code at the top and select the codespaces tab.
  3. Create a new codespace.
  4. You should be in the terminal, switch to the ports tab.
  5. When the ports appear, click on the globe icon by the bottom 6080 port.
  6. The password is
vscode
  1. Enjoy
Made by jonico
